title: Cargo ship sinks off Sri Lanka after weeks on fire, sparking fears of environmental disaster
content:
1. Cargo ship sinks off Sri Lanka after weeks on fire, sparking fears of environmental disaster  NBC News

localize.title: 貨物船がスリランカ沖で数週間後に沈没、環境破壊の恐れも
货船在斯里兰卡附近起火数周后沉没，引发对环境灾难的担忧
貨船在斯里蘭卡附近起火數週後沉沒，引發對環境災難的擔憂
